title: Rep. Adam Schiff
description: Samantha Bee sits down with Congressman Adam Schiff to discuss his new book, Midnight in Washington, if he thinks President Trump will ever run again, the California recall system, and his potential screenwriting career.
author: fullrelease@sambee.com (Samantha Bee)
